title: Extended Warranty Services | Consumer Protection Agency
description: We offer a wide range of plans to protect almost anything you own. Our plans have flexible and transparent contracts with no long-term commitment or hidden fees. Our claims process is easy, just give us a call and we will get back to you in no time.

text.p: We offer a wide range of plans to protect almost anything you own. Our plans have flexible and transparent contracts with no long-term commitment or hidden fees. Our claims process is easy, just give us a call and we will get back to you in no time. Join thousands of our happy customers to enjoy the best services in the industry and save thousands on repair and replacement bills.

Most extended warranties or service contracts don’t protect you in all situations or repairs. For example, some covers only apply to specific parts of the item being protected while some won’t apply if you do not follow the correct procedures for maintenance.

We offer the fastest, easiest, and most automated claims system in the industry. No long-term commitments – all plans are month-to-month, pay as you go. We offer multiple, pocket-friendly plans to suit every budget. No extra costs or hidden fees in all our plans.  It is quick and easy to cancel your protection plan

We have protection plans for literally everything, so you never have to worry about dealing with multiple companies and paying multiple bills. Our contracts are well-defined with no ambiguous or misleading language. Our reps are available 24/7 to listen and help with any issues you may be experiencing
Our cover applies to the entire item being covered and not in parts. Therefore, you can rest easy. We also do not have any conditions for how to maintain your products.

We have done our homework and we understand your pain points. As a result, we are always on a path of discovering, addressing and preventing these pain points for our customers in the easiest way possible. Some of these include: Poor response times for repairs or reimbursements

If you have filed claims before, you know just how long that may take – long enough to test your patience. But you need your phone fixed before work on Monday. Is there a faster way to file your claim?

list.li: Breakdowns are inevitable – we have serviced hundreds of thousands of items and handled over a million service requests
We do not require inspection or maintenance records in order to provide coverage
Over 10,000 service centers nationwide means we will get the right person to fix your issue
If repair is impossible for the covered item, then we will replace it or offer an alternative
Accessible online chat and claims features

card.title: Extra costs and hidden fees
card.p: You have successfully filed a claim and now you are being slapped with a hefty bill for shipping the product back for repairs yet no one mentioned this cost before. These extra costs can quickly get out of hand. What do you do?

card.title: Difficulty in cancelling contract or preventing auto renewal
card.p: Some extended warranty programs make it extremely difficult to cancel a contract or at least prevent the auto renewal feature from charging the monthly bills.

card.title: Multiple service plans for various items
card.p: Having to keep up with separate service plans for your car, home, phone, tablet, TV and appliances is overwhelming, and there is no doubt that these costs can stack up when it comes to settling your monthly bills.

card.title: Deceptive language in the contract
card.p: Some extended warranty contracts use deceptive language intentionally in order to woo clients into agreements that are unfair. This could end up with the clients paying through the nose in terms of deductibles when the covered item malfunctions.

card.title: Stuck in long-term contracts
card.p: You have considered taking a protection plan for your clothes washer and dryer, but you are still unsure of committing yourself to a multi-year agreement. Is there a way to access a plan without the long-term commitment?

card.title: Rude Surprises
card.p: You purchase a used car with over 100,000 miles on the odometer. While it ooks like it is in mint condition, you cannot help wondering what you would do if something catastrophic such as an engine knock were to happen.

card.title: Bank-breaking costs
card.p: We would all love to keep the monthly bills as small as possible, but getting warranties for every appliance and device in your home would be quite expensive. Is there a way you can bundle everything together and just pay one, low monthly fees?

card.title: Poor customer support
card.p: When customers need help with problems or questions, they want a quick and definitive response. Unfortunately, many extended warranty brands fail at this and leave a lot to be desired.

text.p: It is really as quick and easy as it seems! Give us a call, use our mobile app or visit our website to choose a service plan, file for a claim within minutes and get your same-day repair schedule (or get your refund processed) promptly.

Give us a call at customer service OR use the Quick and simple one-step checkout on our website to choose the most suitable service plan. Keep all your plans in one basket for convenience and to save on costs
File a claim in a matter of minutes! Our claims system is the fastest, easiest and most automated in the industry.

We schedule repairs on the same day and refunds are processed without any delays. Our repair or replace service is flexible and fast, with customer satisfaction always at the very top of our priorities.

When you join our home warranty plan, you can be certain that you’re enjoying the most comprehensive coverage available in the market. The package includes 17 appliances in your home as well as four essential systems such as heating and plumbing.

subtitleText.title: You have more devices? No need to worry.

text.p: Optional coverage is also available for over 15 other different systems and devices.The claim and service process has never been simpler and more streamlined with the home warranty plan!
Just call us if any of your registered devices or systems break down. Our knowledgeable and helpful claim staff will set up an appointment for you to have them repaired quickly and efficiently.

list.li: Coverage for 17 household appliances regardless of age
Coverage for four major systems such as central air, heating, hot water heater, electrical and plumbing
Optional add-on protection for 19 additional appliances.
Optional Accidental Damage coverage available for laptops, tablets and smartphones
Low $75 per claim deductible for your covered home appliances and systems
Pay-as-you-go protection plan with no long-term contract
Same day scheduling for repair services
Swap out the appliances you want to be covered at any time
Coverage never expires as long as you continue making your monthly payment
Covers all mechanical and electrical failures

text.p: Washing machines and dryers are the most common appliances to fail. Refrigerators have a tendency to breakdown during the summer months. Ovens often need maintenance during the winter holiday season. Consumer Protection Electronics Warranty Plan. Coverage for everything that plugs in or has a battery!

accordion.title: How does it work?

text.p: For one small monthly fee, the home warranty plan covers 17 home appliances and four systems of your choice for mechanical failures that occur during normal use. The plan covers those repairs necessary to return your product to its intended functionality under normal operation.

accordion.title: Can I cancel my coverage?

text.p: You cancel your plan any time by either calling customer service or logging to user account and cancel.

accordion.title: What is the difference between the Home Warranty Plan and the service plans given by most retailers?

text.p: A retailer’s plan is costly and only covers the newly gadget for a limited period of time. Retailer susually sell you a new plan for each purchase, and these plans frequently cost more than 20% of the device’s initial price. The electronic warranty plan is a low-cost option that covers all of your registered gadgets. You can also add on new purchases to your coverage with no additional costs.

accordion.title: Why do I need a Home Warranty Plan?

text.p: Even modest appliance and system maintenance can be highly costly. If your registered product breaks down due to normal wear and tear during the coverage period, the home warranty plan protects you from footing unexpected repair or replacement costs. Your registered products are just a phone call away from being diagnosed, repaired, replaced, or refunded. And it’s all included in one affordable fee.

accordion.title: How long is the coverage?

text.p: As long as you pay the small monthly fee, your coverage will never expire. Alternatively, should you choose to pay annually, the expiration date will be 12 months from the date of payment indicated on the agreement.

accordion.title: Do you take products from anywhere?

text.p: Any brand from any retailer is covered by the home warranty plan.

accordion.title: Is the Home Warranty Plan insured?

text.p: Yes, the home warranty plan is insured by an A.M. Best A- rated insurance company.

accordion.title: Is there any deductible for repairs?

text.p: Yes, there is a $75 deductible paid to the technician repairing your appliances or system.

accordion.title: Who repairs my devices if they break?

text.p: Only approved service repair personnel are allowed to fix your damaged product. The Consumer Protection Home Warranty Plan offers you the same level of  assistance that you would receive from the product’s  manufacturer or seller, if not higher.

accordion.title: How do I file a service request?

text.p: You can call customer service to request service on any of your registered appliances.

The Consumer Protection Team is changing the dynamics and transforming the world of consumer protection plans. We hit two birds with one stone. We give you coverage for both the electronic devices that you have recently bought and those which you have owned, all under one plan. From TVs to gaming consoles, we’ve got your back. Home theatre systems, computers, small appliances, you name it. Our plan gives you a safe roof for all your electronics.
Our Electronics Warranty Plan isn’t going to tempt you in with a low monthly fee and then slam you with a big deductible. The deductible our electronics warranty plan is a standard $25 per claim.
You can also add Accidental Damage Coverage to your laptops, tablets, and smartphones so that you’re covered if they fall to the floor or drop into water.

subtitleText.title: Get the peace of mind you've always wanted with a coverage that adequately suits your needs

text.p: If you sit down to make a list of every type of electronics in your house from the biggest right down to the smallest, you are suddenly going to realize that you actually do have a lot of devices that you need to use regularly. From laptops, phones to TVs, there are so many devices we own that make our lives so much easier. What becomes of us then, when one of our devices completely stops working or gets damaged? Does this mean that life stops when our devices do? It really does not have to be this way.

list.li: Cover an unlimited number of electronics
Pay-as-you-go protection plan with no long-term contract
Unlimited claims and hassle free service
Local repairs so you don’t have to worry about wasting time shipping your electronics out
Plans are easily transferable to new items

text.p: Protection for products brands. We offer protection for an unlimited number of eligible new and existing products/brands.
We boast of a 98% Zip-Code coverage for In-Home service.
File a claim. Shipping is included. We’ll repair it and send it back, typically within 24 hours.

list.li: All mechanical/electrical breakdowns due to normal use
All mechanical/electrical breakdowns due to normal use
Cover a combination of any three devices of your choice – smartphones, tablets or laptops.
No long-term contracts – just a simple monthly protection plan
Any working device is eligible for protection regardless of brand or age
Local, same-day repairs so you do not have to stay long without your devices
Covers accidental damage and damage caused by liquids
Cancel your plan anytime without any penalties or hidden fees.
Plans are readily transferable to new or upgraded gadgets

accordion.title: How does it work?

text.p: For one low monthly fee, our electronics warranty plan covers mechanical failures and electrical failures that occur during normal use, and accidental damage from drops and spills. The plan covers those repairs necessary to return your device to its intended functionality under normal operation. Our electronics warranty plan covers any mechanical or electronic  failures arising from any accidental damage from spills or drops or during normal use for a small monthly fee. The plan covers the repairs needed to restore your device to its full functionality.

accordion.title: How do I begin?

text.p: Once you enroll, you’ll need to register your eligible devices. These include ones that you’ve purchased within the last 24 months. These devices must be registered within 30 days of your electronic warranty plan activation date. All future purchases must be registered within 30 days of their purchase date. Be sure to keep all of your receipts.

accordion.title: How can I start?

text.p: You’ll need to enroll your eligible devices once  you’ve joined, which include any devices that you’ve bought in the recent 24 months. These devices should be registered within 30 days of the activation date of your electronic warranty plan. For any future electronics, register them within 30 days of their purchase and make a point of keeping a receipt for this and generally other electronics you purchase.

accordion.title: What’s the difference between your Electronics Warranty Plan and service plans offered by retailers?

text.p: A retailer’s plan is costly and only covers the newly gadget for a limited period of time. Retailers usually sell you a new plan for each purchase, and these plans frequently cost more than 20% of the device’s initial price. The electronic warranty plan is a  low-cost option that covers all of your registered gadgets.

accordion.title: How do I cancel?

text.p: You cancel your plan any time by either calling customer service or logging to user account and cancel.

accordion.title: Does it matter where I bought my device?

text.p: Any brand from any retailer is covered by the Electronics Warranty Plan.

accordion.title: Who repairs my device if it breaks?

text.p: Only approved service repair personnel are allowed to fix your damaged product. Our electronics warranty plan offers you the same level of assistance that you would receive from the product’s manufacturer or seller, if not higher.

accordion.title: How long are my products covered?

text.p: As long as you pay the small monthly fee, your coverage will never expire.

accordion.title: What consumer electronics products are eligible for coverage?

text.p: The following items fall under our electronics warranty program: laptops, smartphones, tablets, monitors, eReaders, printers, televisions, game consoles, desktops, cameras, home audio, car audio, video equipment, home theaters, accessories, Mp3 players and alarm clocks.

accordion.title: Is there a cover for accidental damage if I drop my phone or the screen cracks?

text.p: Yes. Accidental damage is covered on all your registered devices.

accordion.title: What happens if I need service?

text.p: When a registered product has to be repaired, call our customer service department.. We have a chain of service repair centers ready to help you with your problem. If the cost of repairing your product surpasses the amount you initially paid for it, or if it can’t be restored because the parts are no longer available or the cost of repair is too steep, you may be eligible for a replacement payment of up to the original buying price (excluding sales tax) of the product.

accordion.title: Is there a deductible during repair?

text.p: Yes. The deductible for the our electronics warranty plan is $25 per claim.

accordion.title: Do I need to keep my receipts?

text.p: Yes. Please remember to keep all of your receipts since a copy of your receipt for the device may be required when requesting repair assistance.

accordion.title: How do I ask for a repair service request if something breaks?

text.p: To submit a service request, dial customer  service. When requesting a repair, you may be asked to produce a copy of your original purchase receipt.

Repairing your vehicle can prove to be quite the costly surprise! With our auto warranty plan, long gone are the days of steep maintenance costs. Your protection with our plan is paid on a monthly basis, unlike standard extended car service contracts, so you won’t have to pay a large free upfront to cater for years of coverage. In our protection plan, as long as you make your monthly payments, your coverage will not end. It is literally a pay as you go service.

Our auto warranty plan can safeguard your vehicle of up to 20 years old and is less than 200,000 in mileage. When a vehicle repair is required, we let you  select your preferred service provider. Simply take your vehicle to any licensed repair center in your region. You can decide to take the vehicle to a new car dealer, your preferred mechanic’s service center, or any chain store that does vehicle repairs, as long as the center is A.S.E Certified. Your claim will be paid quickly and efficiently over the phone by our auto warranty plan. Simply show the service center your warranty plan contract. They’ll get in touch with our claims  department, you’ll only need to pay your deductible.

Parts, labor, and even sales tax, if applicable, are all covered by our auto warranty plan. There is no paperwork or documentation to fill out, no need to set money aside, and you have unlimited number claims you can submit. It’s as simple as that!
We have unmatched response time and transparency in the industry.

subtitleText.title: The journey never stops with Rideshare support

text.p: If your car breaks down anywhere, we will send you a rideshare to get you to your destination safely and on time as we fix your car.
As your car is being worked on, you will be offered rental car reimbursement benefits to allow you to carry on with your business
We have various Protection Plans suited for different budgets. We will find the perfect match for you.
Our plans are the most comprehensive in the industry and are friendly to your pocket
All our plans come with a 30-day money back guarantee.
You have the freedom to choose any ASE certified dealer/mechanic and we will pay them directly.
We honor claims quickly and without any hassle. Our representatives will be in constant contact to give you updates on the status of your claims.
When you put your trust in us, we have no choice but to give you a token of appreciation. Enjoy more benefits the longer you stay with us!

autoWarrantyPlanFeatures.title: Auto Warranty Plan Features

text.p: With every one of our warranty plans you choose, you will get an unlimited number of claims.

Coverage may be canceled at any time during the term of the Contract. Coverage may also be transferred to the new owner of the vehicle in case you decide to sell, thereby increasing the value of the car and making it more enticing for the buyer.
We boast of over 10,000 service centers across the United States. Therefore, you can rest assured that help will be available whenever and wherever you need it.*

autoWarrantyPlanFeatures.disclaimer: *The claim waiting period is only 30 days and 1,000 miles!

accordion.title: Is a vehicle inspection required?

text.p: No, you do not need a vehicle inspection. However, it is important to note that vehicle service contracts do not cover any pre-existing condition, regardless of the firm you obtain a protection plan from.

accordion.title: Can I still buy a Consumer Protection Auto Warranty Plan after the manufacturer's warranty has expired?

text.p: Yes, our auto warranty plan can safeguard your vehicle of up to 20 years old and is less than 200,000 in mileage even after your manufacturer’s warranty has expired.

accordion.title: Is Consumer Protection Auto Warranty Plan insured?

text.p: Yes, our auto warranty Plan is insured by A.M. Best A- rated insurance company.

accordion.title: How is the monthly fee paid?

text.p: Our auto warranty plan is automatic, renewed every month using the credit or debit card information you provided us when you signed up.

accordion.title: What information is needed to purchase the Consumer Protection Auto Warranty Plan?

text.p: The information needed include the make, model, year and mileage. Additionally, we will require your Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) and the state you live in.

accordion.title: When does my auto warranty plan become effective?

text.p: Your auto warranty plan Vehicle Protection plan only require either 30-day waiting period or 1000 mile waiting period before your vehicle repair coverage starts.

accordion.title: When will my auto warranty plan expire?

text.p: As long as the monthly payments are made, your subscription will not expire.

accordion.title: Is wear and tear coverage included in the Auto Warranty Plan?

text.p: Yes, wear and tear coverage is included. Auto warranty plan will never expire.

accordion.title: What is wear and tear coverage and what does it cover?

text.p: Wear and tear coverages mean that a part does not  have to break for you to be covered. Should a part or component wear out prematurely, it is covered. Wear and Tear coverage is defined as the part that can no longer perform the function it was designed for solely because of its condition.

accordion.title: How do I know if my vehicle qualifies?

text.p: Your vehicle needs to be no more than 20 years old and with less then 200,000 miles, with the exceptions of a few excluded vehicles.
